#summary Developer's Guide.

= Introduction =

*QuickFIX Messenger* is a front-end messaging application for the [http://www.quickfixj.org QuickFIX/J] engine.

It provides an easy to use graphical user interface (GUI) for constructing and sending FIX messages across a given FIX session.

QuickFIX Messenger is fully open source under the [http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause new BSD License]. Interested contributors may let their intentions known to <a href="mailto:jramoyo@gmail.com">jramoyo@gmail.com</a>

= Development Environment =
== Required Tools ==
 * A modern Java IDE; [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/ Eclipse] is highly recommended
 * An updated [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html Java Development Kit]
